sentences.en: Answer: Workshop worker can hide below car, machine tool and loftier equipment, not portentous fluster runs.
sentences.cn: 答: 车间工人可以躲在车 、 机床及较高大的设备下, 不可惊慌乱跑.

sentences.en: Before me stretched the portentous, menacing road of a new decade.
sentences.cn: 在我面前展现出一条新的十年的凶多吉少 、 咄咄逼人的道路.

sentences.en: He introduced each portentous subject with buoyant enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他热情彭湃地介绍着每个怪异的话题.
我预感不祥的事情要来到了.
其后果具有重大的历史影响.

sentences.en: Keep it, in any case, familiar, facetious even, rather then pedantic and portentous.
sentences.cn: 无论如何, 要使它显得很随便, 甚至滑稽可笑, 而不要显得很迂腐,夜郎自大.

sentences.en: Portentous choices were forced on him by the dozen.
sentences.cn: 众多事关重大的抉择强加在了他身上。

sentences.en: Recent developments are as portentous as the collapse of the Berlin Wall.
sentences.cn: 最近的事态发展犹如柏林墙的倒塌，让人有一种山雨欲来风满楼的感觉。

sentences.en: Such a portentous and mysterious monster roused all my curiosity ( Herman Melville )
sentences.cn: 这样奇特而神秘的巨怪引起我强烈的兴趣 ( 赫尔曼梅尔维尔 )

sentences.en: There was nothing portentous or solemn about him. He was bubbling with humour.
sentences.cn: 他一点也不装腔作势或故作严肃，浑身散发着幽默。

sentences.en: These writers paint a portentous picture.
sentences.cn: 这些经济作者勾勒出一幅奇特的画面.
